attributes.action: Stop the humiliation,torture, murder and gay hate crime in Russia. This is a human rights issue a right to be who you are and be free of fear.
attributes.additional_details: For the government to intervene in the human rights issues regarding homophobia in Russia. The government is very quick to intervene in other countries where persecution and and hate is promoted. It is time to stop this in Russian and stop it now. For more information watch the channel 4 documentary Hunted shown 5th February 2014.
